Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sprite

  • public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to make the different sprites that the game uses like the zombies and player.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sprite(java.lang.String sprite, int tile_size)
      When making a new sprite, it needs the name of the file and how big each sprite needs to be.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getSprite(int row, int col)
      Gets the subimage of the sprite sheet by moving over a certain amount of pixels each time and grabbing that image.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage loadSprite(java.lang.String file)
      Loads in sprite from a file

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(java.lang.String sprite,
              int tile_size)
        When making a new sprite, it needs the name of the file and how big each sprite needs to be.
        Parameters:
        sprite - file name
        tile_size - 80 pixels

    • Method Detail

      • getSprite

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getSprite(int row,
                                              int col)
        Gets the subimage of the sprite sheet by moving over a certain amount of pixels each time and grabbing that image.
        Parameters:
        row - Row of sheet
        col - Col of sheet
        Returns:
        buffered image

      • loadSprite

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage loadSprite(java.lang.String file)
        Loads in sprite from a file
        Parameters:
        file - Sprite sheet .png
        Returns:
        a buffered image
